Annotation Notes: Unique identifier for subject within site
Subject birth date in ISO8601 format
Age calculated as years from birth to informed consent
Biological sex: M=Male, F=Female; must be standardized
Race per CDISC terminology; may have missing values
Ethnicity: HISPANIC OR LATINO / NOT HISPANIC OR LATINO
Reference start date (informed consent); establishes study day 1
Reference end date; study termination date
Randomized treatment arm code: TRT=Active, PBO=Placebo
Date/time when DM record was created
Study day relative to RFSTDTC; Day 1 = informed consent date
